title: I received an icon from riot

embed.description: UPDATE @ ~9 PM PT: Second small PBE patch out. New Blitzcrank summoner icon added!] The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 7.6 PBE cycle, today's posts includes a new summoner icon, updated pick & ban quotes for Lux to go with her updated VO, various tweaks for Pug'Maw and VFX changes for Arcade Corki, several tentative balance changes, and more!

body: the icon i received is in the link, and i just randomly got it after winning a game. attached to the note was just "Thank you!"

replies.body: It looks like you've received an icon for playing the Advanced Bot mode.  Thanks for helping out with testing!  https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net/emoticons/v1/88/1.0

Hey. 
this icon how long approx will it take to be handed out, i played over april fools against the bots but i havent yet recieved the icon,, should i send an email to support?
 - slash529

Damn, you were really cutting it close.  I see a game that was played on the first but were marked as a leaver.  Luckily, I see some other games that should still have made you eligible.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do!  Hang tight for now!
